parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Failure of the ABS system can lead to extended stopping distances, loss of control, and increased risk of accidents, especially in wet weather conditions.
symptoms: clutch jerks ahead when coming to a stop.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Failure of the brake system can lead to loss of control, extended stopping distances, and increased risk of accidents.
symptoms: Brake pedal goes to the floor
brake pads need to be replaced frequently

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Brake drag and overheating can cause the brakes to lock up, leading to loss of control and increased risk of accidents.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Rear Axle Assembly and Brake Line Failure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Failure of the rear axle assembly and brake line can cause loss of brake fluid and diminished braking, leading to loss of control and increased risk of accidents.
symptoms: Loose bolts attaching rear axle assembly

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Warped brake drums can cause the brakes to malfunction, leading to loss of control and increased risk of accidents.
symptoms: Brake drums get warped out of round
brake drums need to be replaced frequently.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Electrical system failures can cause fires in the steering column, resulting in injuries, vehicle damage, and potentially life-threatening situations.
symptoms: Smoke coming from the steering column
brake light and ABS system malfunction.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Electrical system malfunctions can cause the battery to drain, leading to unexpected stalls and potential safety risks.
Electrical system failures can cause accessory malfunctions, such as faulty horn operation, which can lead to safety issues.
symptoms: Difficulty accessing horn in a timely manner.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Electrical system malfunctions can cause fuse failures, leading to system failures and potential safety risks.
symptoms: Fuse controlling the blower for the HVAC fails.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Electrical system failures can cause wiring issues, leading to fires, smoke, and potential safety risks.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Turn Signal Switch and Steering Column Design Issues
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The design of the turn signal switch and steering column can cause difficulties in switching between high and low beams, leading to poor visibility and potential accidents. Additionally, electrical shorts and malfunctions can cause smoke and sparks, posing a fire hazard.
symptoms: Unable to switch from high to low beams while turning
turn signal switch hits the steering wheel
smoke and sparks coming from the steering column area
intermittent smoke from the hazard light switch
burning plastic smell/smoke from the steering column
and the switch that turns lights from low to high sometimes turns lights completely off.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Electrical Shorts and Malfunctions in the Steering Column
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Electrical shorts and malfunctions in the steering column can cause smoke and sparks, posing a fire hazard and potentially leading to accidents.
symptoms: Smoke and sparks coming from the steering column area
intermittent smoke from the hazard light switch
burning plastic smell/smoke from the steering column
and the flasher unit within the steering column fails.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the engine head gasket can cause engine overheating, misfires, and damage to other engine components, leading to costly repairs and potential safety hazards.
symptoms: and white smoke coming from the exhaust.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the motor mounts can cause vibrations, noise, and potential safety hazards, such as engine damage or loss of control.
symptoms: and engine movement when idling or in reverse.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The malfunction of the temperature gauge can cause engine overheating, damage to engine components, and potential safety hazards.
symptoms: and warning lights on the dashboard.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The engine idling issues can cause loss of control, accidents, and potential safety hazards.
The engine fire can cause serious safety hazards, including injury or death.
The failure of the intake manifold gasket can cause engine misfires, overheating, and loss of power.
The failure of the muffler and pipe can cause noise, vibrations, and potential safety hazards.
